title: New train refurbishment to rid Scotland’s railways of effluent (Transport Scotland)
text: ( Source : Transport Scotland ) Work on the first of 47 Class 156 ScotRail trains to be fitted with Control Emission Toilet ( CET ) equipment is due for completion tomorrow (Friday 16 October ), with the unit scheduled to be moved back into
